com.tikal.jenkins.plugins.multijob.Multi.description: WARNING: THIS IS AN AUTO-GENERATED JOB DEFINITION. CHANGES MADE USING THE ONLINE EDITOR WILL NOT BE HONORED. MAKE CHANGES TO THE JOB DEFINITIONS IN THE openshift/aos-cd-jobs REPOSITORY INSTEAD.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi latest="$( readlink "${HOME}/origin-ci-tool/latest" )" touch "${latest}" cp "${latest}/bin/activate" "${WORKSPACE}/activate" cat >> "${WORKSPACE}/activate" <<EOF export OCT_CONFIG_HOME="${WORKSPACE}/.config" EOF
source "${WORKSPACE}/activate" mkdir -p "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}" rm -rf "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}/origin-ci-tool" oct configure ansible-client verbosity 2 oct configure aws-client 'keypair_name' 'openshift-dev' oct configure aws-client 'private_key_path' '/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/openshift-dev.pem'

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: PROVISION CLOUD RESOURCES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: PROVISION CLOUD RESOURCES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi
oct image_not_ready --os "rhel" --stage "base" --provider "aws" oct provision remote all-in-one --os "rhel" --stage "base" --provider "aws" --discrete-ssh-config --name "${JOB_NAME}_${BUILD_NUMBER}" --launch-unready

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: USE A RAMDISK FOR ETCD ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: USE A RAMDISK FOR ETCD [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" sudo su root <<SUDO mkdir -p /tmp mount -t tmpfs -o size=8192m tmpfs /tmp mkdir -p /tmp/etcd chmod a+rwx /tmp/etcd restorecon -R /tmp echo "ETCD_DATA_DIR=/tmp/etcd" >> /etc/environment SUDO SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD AN ORIGIN RELEASE ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD AN ORIGIN RELEASE [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/origin" export OS_BUILD_IMAGE_ARGS='' hack/build-base-images.sh make release SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: DETERMINE THE RELEASE COMMIT FOR ORIGIN IMAGES AND VERSION FOR RPMS ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: DETERMINE THE RELEASE COMMIT FOR ORIGIN IMAGES AND VERSION FOR RPMS [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/origin" jobs_repo="/data/src/github.com/openshift/aos-cd-jobs/" git log -1 --pretty=%h >> "\${jobs_repo}/ORIGIN_COMMIT" ( source hack/lib/init.sh; os::build::rpm::get_nvra_vars; echo "-\${OS_RPM_VERSION}-\${OS_RPM_RELEASE}" ) >> "\${jobs_repo}/ORIGIN_PKG_VERSION" SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 600 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD THE IMAGE REGISTRY CONTAINER IMAGE ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD THE IMAGE REGISTRY CONTAINER IMAGE [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/image-registry" make build-images docker tag openshift/origin-docker-registry:latest "openshift/origin-docker-registry:\$( cat /data/src/github.com/openshift/aos-cd-jobs/ORIGIN_COMMIT )" SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 3600 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD THE KUBERNETES METRICS SERVER CONTAINER IMAGE ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD THE KUBERNETES METRICS SERVER CONTAINER IMAGE [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/kubernetes-metrics-server" make build-images docker tag openshift/origin-metrics-server:latest "openshift/origin-metrics-server:\$( cat /data/src/github.com/openshift/aos-cd-jobs/ORIGIN_COMMIT )" SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 3600 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: VERIFY COMMIT HISTORY ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: VERIFY COMMIT HISTORY [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/origin" # run commitchecker outside release container as it needs # access to git; also explicitly force godeps verification branch="\$( git rev-parse --abbrev-ref --symbolic-full-name HEAD )" if [[ "\${branch}" == "master" ]]; then RESTORE_AND_VERIFY_GODEPS=1 make verify-commits -j fi SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: RUN CHECK AND VERIFY TASKS ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: RUN CHECK AND VERIFY TASKS [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/origin" OS_BUILD_ENV_PULL_IMAGE=true OS_BUILD_ENV_EXCLUDE='_output/local/go' hack/env TEST_KUBE='true' JUNIT_REPORT='true' make check -o build -j -k SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: RUN EXTENDED CONFORMANCE TESTS ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: RUN EXTENDED CONFORMANCE TESTS [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/origin" JUNIT_REPORT='true' make test-extended SUITE=conformance SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: RUN EXTENDED NETWORKING TESTS ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: RUN EXTENDED NETWORKING TESTS [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/origin" JUNIT_REPORT='true' make test-extended SUITE=networking-minimal SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ${WORKSPACE}/.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""
